strings.Consolidating and Extending hosts files: Consolidating and Extending hosts files from several well-curated sources. You can optionally pick extensions to block Porn, Social Media, and other categories.
strings.A blocklist with unique extensions to ch: A blocklist with unique extensions to choose from. Be aware it is more aggressive, and may break apps or sites. It blocks graph.facebook.com and mqtt-mini.facebook.com. You may consider whitelisting them in the Activity section, in case you experience problems with Facebook apps.
strings.A special blocklist containing mobile ad: A special blocklist containing mobile ad providers.
A blocklist to filter phishing websites. Phishing is a malpractice based on redirecting to fake websites, which look exactly like the original ones, in order to trick visitors, and steal sensitive information. Installing this blocklist will help you prevent such situations.
strings.A new and upcoming tracker database: A new and upcoming tracker database
strings.DuckDuckGo Tracker Radar is a best-in-cl: DuckDuckGo Tracker Radar is a best-in-class data set about trackers that is automatically generated and maintained through continuous crawling and analysis. See the author information for details.
strings.Curated blocklist to block trackers and: Curated blocklist to block trackers and advertisements
strings.This is a curated and well-maintained bl: This is a curated and well-maintained blocklist to block ads, tracking, and more! Updated regularly.
strings.Analyzes privacy concerns in Android app: Analyzes privacy concerns in Android applications
strings.This blocklist is based on The Exodus Pr: This blocklist is based on The Exodus Privacy project, which analyses Android applications and looks for embedded trackers. A tracker is a piece of software meant to collect data about you, or what you do. This is a very small list, so you should also activate one of the more popular lists (like Energized).
strings.Blocks ads, phishing, malware, spyware,: Blocks ads, phishing, malware, spyware, ransomware, scam, telemetry, analytics, tracking (where not needed for proper functionality). Should not interfere w normal apps and services.
